query:
INSERT INTO chatter (
                id,
                name,
                login,
                color,
                image,
                total,
                private,
                created_at, 
                updated_at
            )
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, 1, false, $6, $7)
            ON CONFLICT (id)
            DO UPDATE SET
                name = $2,
                login = $3,
                color = $4,
                image = $5,
                total = chatter.total + 1,
                created_at = EXCLUDED.created_at,
                updated_at = NOW()
            RETURNING total
